qas.question: What is Catalan a variety of?
What are the degrees of similarity with Occitan and Gallo-Romance languages?
What are there besides degrees of similarity with Occitan?
What does Catalan share with other Romance languages?
Why does Catalan share many traits with other Romance languages?

context: Catalan bears <a1_0>varying degrees<a1_0/> of similarity to the linguistic varieties subsumed under the cover term <a0_0>Occitan language<a0_0/> (see also <a2_0>differences<a2_0/> between Occitan and Catalan and Gallo-Romance languages). Thus, as it should be expected from <a4_0>closely related<a4_0/> languages, Catalan today shares <a3_0>many traits<a3_0/> with other Romance languages.
